title: Masterpieces of Photography from the Museum's Collection
description: This exhibition was comprised of forty-six images. Photographers included: Robert Adamson, Frederick Evans, Francis Frith, Arnold Genthe, David Octavius Hill, Heinrich Kuehn, Arnold Newman, Arthur Siegel, Edward Steichen, Alfred Stieglitz, Paul Strand, Todd Webb, Brett Weston, Edward Weston, and Clarence H. White.

input: Masterpieces of Photography from the Museum's Collection
